      • parse

        public static java.awt.Color parse(java.lang.String nm)
                            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Parses the specified Color as a string.
        Parameters:
        nm - of the color as a 24-bit integer, the format of the string can be either htmlcolor #xxxxxx or xxxxxx.
        Returns:
        the new color.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the format of the string does not comply with rules or illegal charater for the 24-bit integer as a string.
